message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: Commit and Push
steps.run:
git config user.email "${{ secrets.GIT_CONFIG_EMAIL }}"
git config user.name "${{ secrets.GIT_CONFIG_NAME }}"
git add .
git commit -m "Deploy Production Code for Commit ${{ github.sha }} 🚀"
git push
